entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Aarik And The Ruined Kingdom

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Aarik And The Ruined Kingdom*):

ul.li: Description: Guide Aarik through wreck and ruin in this relaxing perspective puzzle adventure where the puzzle is your environment. Using your fathers crown repair, rework and rewind to mend your broken world.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - QuickShot

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Quickshot*):

ul.li: Description: The makers of The Tower send you to the Quickshot boot camp to give you a fighting chance in the war against the machines. Use pistols, shotguns, lasers, submachine guns and chain guns to take down targets launched at you and avoid obstacles to not get smashed. Open fire in slow motion and get in cover when getting shot at or wield a weapon from more civilized days.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Dungeon Defense

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Dungeon Defense*):

ul.li:
Description: Defeat all invaders to defend your dungeon! Collect more weapons and monsters to make them stronger. Enjoy various contents such as "dungeon building, collect various weapons, achievements"
In order to defend the last remaining dungeon of this world, you became a guardian. Heroes from all over the world gather to conquer the dungeon. Never be defeated, be the best dungeon!
◈ Enjoy "Retro graphics & Sounds". ◈ Easy to play, anyone can enjoy it easily. ◈ Please enjoy the pleasure by sweeping away enemies. ◈ Organize a variety of mercenaries and find synergies. ◈ Rewards are waiting for each achievement.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Piano

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (The Piano*):

ul.li: Ratings: Steam 59 % (6/10, 22 recommendations) / IGDB Meta 50 % (1 sources) / IGDB User 50 % (2 sources)

Description: The Piano is a third-person singleplayer adventure game set in Paris in the late 1940's. After the murders of his formerly famous brothers, John Barnerway, a failed pianist, tries to solve the mystery behind their deaths while he himself struggles with his mental illness and the accusations by the people and press.

div.p: * Any information about the offer is automatically grabbed and may in rare cases not match the correct game.

entry.title: Google Play Store (Game) - Space Rush

div.p: Claim it now for free on Google Play Store.
About the game (Deep Space Rush*):

ul.li:
Description: Join the DeTeam! A top-secret security force that protects the scientific space stations from virus contaminations!
Take on randomly generated levels to save everyone before they all get infected. Avoid traps and monsters to survive the sweep!
Are you ready to protect the space stations from biological threats? Then grab your gun, jump into your ship, and prepare for lift-off!
